title: Pasta Primavera
tagline: Fresh vegetables in light cream sauce
steps: Cook pasta. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Sauté zucchini and squash in oil until browned, 3-4 minutes. Set aside.
Add butter, sauté asparagus 2 minutes. Add garlic, cook 30 seconds.
Add wine, reduce by half. Add cream and tomatoes.
Return vegetables with peas. Simmer 2 minutes.
Add pasta and Parmesan. Toss, adding pasta water for consistency.
Stir in basil, season to taste.
notes: Cook each vegetable separately for best doneness.
Use whatever vegetables are in season.
